mapper.sql: id, name, QQ, type, enrolmentTime, graduated, number, daily, ambition, responsible, wfrom, telipone, email, portrait, create_at, update_at
mapper.select: SELECT portrait from student WHERE NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
SELECT portrait from student WHERE telipone = #{telipone,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.insert: insert into student (id, name, QQ, type, enrolmentTime, graduated, number, daily, ambition, responsible, wfrom, telipone, email, portrait, create_at, update_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enrolmenttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{graduated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daily,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ambition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telipone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=BIGINT})
